item.description:
What is Jo Joâ€™s all about?
What is their history?

A little history
Although they may disavow it rigorously, Bill Sze and Cathy Wei are the proprietors of Jojo's Coffee and Tea.
Jojo is not two cups of Joe, Jojo is Bill's daughter. She is a professional student at the University of Massachusetts.
Bill named the shop Jojo's because he really works to pay off her credit cards.

Prior to Jojo's, Bill wrote computer program for a living. After putting tons of endless loops and go to spaghetti code into otherwise perfectly functioning software,
Bill realized the only use he has with computer is play games on it.
So after experienced a major mid-life crisis he decided to give bean roasting a whirl.
Cathy got into this crazy business because she made the huge mistake of marrying Bill.



A.
